alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Madison; Oneida; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:16PM EDT until May 16 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Oneida County in central New York... Western Otsego County in central New York... Eastern Madison County in central New York... Northeastern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 215 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Taberg to near Poolville to near Norwich to near Morris, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Utica, Rome, Oneida, Kirkland, Lenox, Norwich, Lee, Verona, Westmoreland and Vienna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
